伻字的基本解释

伻
pēng
出使，令使。
使者。

伻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bēng］
［《廣韻》普耕切，平耕，滂。］
［《集韻》悲萌切，平耕，幫。］
(1)使。
(2)使者。
(3)指仆人。

伻字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　伻； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页97第09
【廣韻】普耕切【集韻】【韻會】悲萌切【正韻】補耕切，?音抨。【爾雅·釋詁】使也。又從也。【書·洛誥】伻來以圖及獻卜。又【立政】乃伻我有夏式商受命。【註】使周有此諸夏，用商所受之命也。

伻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
伻字的起名意思

意指使者。

伻
Basic explanation of words
伻
pēng
Make an envoy.
messenger.
伻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bēng］
["Guang Yun" general ploughing and cutting, flat ploughing, plowing. ]
["Ji Yun" is sad and cute, flat plowing, helping. ]
(1) Make.
(2) Messenger.
(3) Refers to servants.
伻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　伻; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 97 09
[Guang Yun] General plowing and cutting [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Sad and cute cutting [Zheng Yun] Supplementing plowing and cutting, sound criticized. 【Erya·Shi Xuan】Shi Ye. From again. [Book·Luogao] You come with pictures and divination. Also 【Lizheng】Naizu, I have Xia Shi Shang to be ordered. [Note] To make Zhou have these summers, the orders received by the merchants are also used.

Name meaning
Means messenger.
bēng
I сущ.
* слуга; посыльный, посланник
